testmode.label: Enable Testmode
testmode.comment: If disabled, testmode callbacks will not be accepted.

text_on_statement.label: Text on Statement
text_on_statement.comment:
Text that will be placed on cardholder's bank statement (max 22 ASCII characters and only supported by Clearhaus currently).
Has to start with Default descriptor, as described in your agreement with Clearhaus

payment_methods_specified.label: Payment Methods
payment_methods_specified.comment: Type in the cards you wish to accept (comma separated). See the valid payment types here: http://tech.quickpay.net/appendixes/payment-methods/

cardlogos_size.label: Cardlogo Size
cardlogos_size.comment: The max pixel height (without the px)

order_status_after_payment.label: Ny ordre status (Efter betaling er auth)

order_status.label: Ny ordre status (Før betaling er gennemført)

pending_payment_order_cancel.label: Annuller Automatisk
pending_payment_order_cancel.comment: Annuller automatisk ordre uden betaling efter 24 timer

sendmailorderconfirmation.label: Send e-mail Ordrebekræftelse.
sendmailorderconfirmation.comment: Aktivering af denne indstilling vil resultere i en email-bekræftelse sendes når betalingen er foretaget.

sendmailorderconfirmationbefore.label: Send e-mail Ordrebekræftelse før.
sendmailorderconfirmationbefore.comment: Aktivering af denne indstilling vil resultere i en email-bekræftelse sendes før betalingen er foretaget.

subtract_stock_on_processing.label: Træk først varer fra lager når betalingen er gennemført.
subtract_stock_on_processing.comment: Bemærk: Annullering af ikke betalte ordre, vil give falske lagerantal, medmindre 'Sæt produktets status til 'på lager' når en ordre annulleres' er sat til 'Nej'

shipping_store_pick_up.comment: Shipping price for "Hent i butikken" shipping method
